item.title: CVE-2021-23285|2024-09-16T22:41:39.422Z -- eaton -- intelligent%20power%20manager%20infrastructure%20%28ipm%20infrastructure%29
item.description: Eaton Intelligent Power Manager Infrastructure (IPM Infrastructure) version 1.5.0plus205 and all prior versions are vulnerable to reflected Cross-site Scripting vulnerability. This issue affects: Eaton Intelligent Power Manager Infrastructure (IPM Infrastructure) all version 1.5.0plus205 and prior versions.
